entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quote completion improvements #71898
  • Test plan for "`Lock` object" feature #71888

Closed

  • CallerArgumentExpression for out arguments #71901
  • Rationalize FlushAsync taking a CancellationToken in `net8.0` #71580
  • Raw String Literal Concatenation Does Not Preserve NewLines #71895
  • Collection expressions wrapping can't be configured #71891
  • Remove RoslynImageCatalogGuid #6078
    Backlog
  • "Extract interface" generates invalid code for read-write properties #71640
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Upgrade Language Server to run on .NET 8 #71903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #71900
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to Preview 4 image #71899
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable autoBraceSurround on 17.9 P2 tests #71897
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Provide overloads to avoid unnecessary boxing #71894
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fail tests if errors are reported #71893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Misc fixes #71892
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update `Lock` object feature status #71889
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allocate exactly the space needed when creating a sourcetext #71886
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove support for base extensions #71883
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update publishing configuration for new alpine linux package name #71902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Improve and clarify the logic around project syncing" #71873
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve error location of missing `object.ToString()` for concatenation #71890
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure we don't leak the request info if a request is cancelled #71737
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Recreate the get accessor when extracting an interface member #71797
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Move from out parameters to a return tuple #71885
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove cloud cache system #71887
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use extensions to make reading/writing streams easier #71882
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix nrt annotation #71884
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove pointless parameter #71875
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Simplify the work with generated BoundNodes and emit the xml comments as doc comment in the generated code file #71601
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Helping runtime diagnose a CI bug #71724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fetch all changed projects in a single sync call #71874
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactors LSP server extension assembly loading #71862
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve syncing of project cones. #71826
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add `Lock` object feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Restored the reverted XAML PR (Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170) #71758
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Switch the BuildHost to build with net6.0 again #71881
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change an ApplyChangeToWorkspace overload to remove some async #71830
    Area-IDE
  • Write and read uniformly in objectwriter/objectreader #71877
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Sit object reader/writer on top of pipes. #71880
    Area-IDE, untriaged
